seo: HTTP请求伪造,IP伪造,127.0.0.1,漏洞检测
summary: 该插件通过伪造HTTP请求头中的多个字段（如X-Forwarded-For、X-Real-IP等），将目标IP设置为127.0.0.1，用于检测系统是否存在IP伪造相关漏洞。
summary_en: This plugin forges multiple fields in the HTTP request header (such as X-Forwarded-For, X-Real-IP, etc.), setting the target IP to 127.0.0.1, to detect whether the system has IP spoofing related vulnerabilities.
